title: Welcome Artisans!
content: Let's introduce ourselves. Click on this post, anc comment below your name, what you do, and a fun fact about yourself üòÑ
contentHtml: Let's introduce ourselves. Click on this post, anc comment below your name, what you do, and a fun fact about yourself üòÑ

title: Introduction
content:
Hello;
My name is Juan Shannon. I am the founder of Parker Village in the historic city of Highland Park, Michigan.
Parker Village is a smart neighborhood development anchored by a community resource center.
Our focus is Renewable Energy, Technology, Aquaculture and all forms of Media.
Parker Village includes net zero housing, a co-work space, Healthy choice food cafe, maker space, co-work space, an urban and aquaponics FARM
and a state of the art event center. We are powered by Solar Energy and will include Wind and Blue infrastructure power in the future.
We also currently have Solar Smart street lighting that provides a meshnet internet service in the neighborhood.
contentHtml:

and a state of the art event center. We are powered by Solar Energy and will include Wind and Blue infrastructure power in the future.
We also currently have Solar Smart street lighting that provides a meshnet internet service in the neighborhood.

title: Micheal
content:
Hello all,
My name is Micheal. I am a Ph.D. student at the University of Michigan. Prof. Ron is supervising me. I am part of the lab.

title: Introduction
content: Hi, I'm Zenaida Flores, Vice President and Research Director with Rescue MI Nature Now, Inc. We're a nonprofit that transforms blighted parcels to educational greenspaces, like community gardens and native pollinator habitats. Our sustainable youth stewardship program is responsible for all of the transformations.
contentHtml: Hi, I'm Zenaida Flores, Vice President and Research Director with Rescue MI Nature Now, Inc. We're a nonprofit that transforms blighted parcels to educational greenspaces, like community gardens and native pollinator habitats. Our sustainable youth stewardship program is responsible for all of the transformations.

title: Hello

title: Hello From Family First Solar
content:
Hello.  I am Kodjo Lee, CEO of Family First Solar, EV charging performance engineer at GM, and life long west African djembe (drum) student.

If you have any renewable energy or electric vehicle questions, I am here to serve!

www.family1stsolar.com
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kodjomlee/
contentHtml:
Hello. I am Kodjo Lee, CEO of Family First Solar, EV charging performance engineer at GM, and life long west African djembe (drum) student.

If you have any renewable energy or electric vehicle questions, I am here to serve!

www.family1stsolar.com
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kodjomlee/

title: Hello everyone! I'm Dom
content: I am a Designer Entrepreneur with a background in Fashion Design and Product Development. I utilize my background to education inspiring designers in the area of Sewing , Draping, Pattern Making and etc. In addition to educating, I own and operate my own Fashion House and Mobile Boutique housing my own designs that is cut and sewn by my team and myself. I look forward to working with you all!
contentHtml: I am a Designer Entrepreneur with a background in Fashion Design and Product Development. I utilize my background to education inspiring designers in the area of Sewing , Draping, Pattern Making and etc. In addition to educating, I own and operate my own Fashion House and Mobile Boutique housing my own designs that is cut and sewn by my team and myself. I look forward to working with you all!
